questionTitle: I lost too much money betting at the races last time, so you won't ________ me to go again.
It is not long until the exam; you ought to stop ________ so much television and study a bit more.
In the ________ left-hand corner of the picture there is a white mark.
Their aim is to ________ up a new political party.
He could not have known what was in the letter ________ he had written it himself.
He found learning to drive easy and ________ his driving test the very first time.
The Finance Minister will be making a ________ today about new rates of income tax.
I know nothing about televisions, so when mine broke down, I took it to the shop to ________.
Don't ________ up yet; you will soon be able to play the trumpet well.
The train will be leaving in five minutes so you ________ better hurry up.
He ________ me to buy my air ticket immediately or it would be too late.
As the streets of our cities become busier, people are turning more and more to the ________ bicycle.
I have forgotten to ________ today and I'll have to go to the bank tomorrow.
He wrote everything that ________ about it.
She works very hard, as she is ________ all our students' affairs.
It takes years to ________ as a doctor.
The ________ of the air by toxic gases is one of the major problems of this century.
Although his work was often ________ and ________, he was promoted anyway, simply because he had been with the company longer than anyone else.
They sent a sample of pottery they had found to the laboratory so that a date could be ________ on it.
Our school ________ for the summer holidays on 10th July.
